title: New: Charlotte Cardin – Faulfile
content:
As I’m sure my GCSE French teacher would attest to, my knowledge of the language is minimal at best.

Unfortunately, that doesn’t bode well for being able to tell you much about the latest track from Quebec’s Charlotte Cardin – aside from that it’s absolutely otherworldly. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
